data.description: Добрый день! Просьба внести нового сотрудника в программу: Ширяев Александр Фёдорович, п.п 9253486, курьер. Спасибо.
data.creator: a.savostikova

sql:
SELECT ji.created, ji.issuenum, ji.summary, ji.description, ji.creator, c.cname, 
ji.issuetype,
ja.actionbody, 
ja.actiontype, 
ja.author  as action_author, 
ja.created  as action_date
FROM jiraissue ji
    INNER JOIN nodeassociation na ON ji.id = na.source_node_id
    INNER JOIN component c ON na.sink_node_id = c.id
    INNER JOIN jiraaction ja on ja.issueid=ji.id
    WHERE ji.project = '11000' 
        AND ji.created between '2020-09-01' and '2020-09-02'
            ORDER BY created asc limit 1
